alert.note: Alert for Beaver Island and surrounding islands; Cheboygan; Emmet; Mackinac Island, Bois Blanc Island (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 23 at 10:26AM EST until December 24 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 11 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Emmet and Cheboygan Counties, and Mackinac Island/Bois Blanc Island and Beaver Island and surrounding islands. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Beaver Island and surrounding islands; Cheboygan; Emmet; Mackinac Island, Bois Blanc Island
